name: Friedman Industries, Incorporated
description: Friedman Industries, Incorporated is a leading manufacturer and supplier of steel products in the United States. Established in 1965 and headquartered in Longview, Texas, the company specializes in the production of steel plates and coils, serving a diverse range of industries including construction, manufacturing, and energy. Friedman Industries operates multiple production facilities that utilize advanced technology to ensure high-quality steel products that meet the stringent requirements of its customers. The company is committed to sustainability and has implemented various practices to minimize its environmental impact, including recycling scrap steel and reducing waste in its operations. In addition to its manufacturing capabilities, Friedman Industries also offers value-added services such as processing, cutting, and logistics support to enhance customer satisfaction. The company’s mission is to provide superior steel products while maintaining a strong focus on safety, quality, and integrity in all its business dealings.
